settings.text:
Join an exclusive community of detailing enthusiasts with our That Detail Loyalty

Program. Get limited-edition designs, special pricing, and exclusive rewards,

& more to come soon.

settings.heading: What is the That Detail Loyalty Program?

settings.text: Welcome to ThatDetailShop.com's That Detail Loyalty Program, where detailing culture meets exclusive style. This program is your ticket to fresh, limited-edition designs each month that resonate with auto detailing enthusiasts, car lovers, and hard-working professionals like you. These shirts aren't just apparel—they're a badge of pride for the community we're building together.

settings.title: 250K+
settings.description: Social Followers

settings.description: Avg. Post Likes

settings.title: Tap In Monthly
settings.description:
At the start of each month, a brand-new,exclusive t-shirt design drops on ThatDetailShop.com. Purchase the featureddesign during the month to get it at its special launch price.

New designs every month!

settings.title: Keep Your Collection Growing
settings.description:
Missed a month? No problem! Previous designs remain available for purchase at a $10 premium. This ensures you can still complete your collection while promoting the exclusivity of being an early adopter.

Complete your collection anytime.

settings.title: Submitfor Loyalty Perks
settings.description:
After purchasing 4 T-Shirt of the Month designs, send proof of purchase and a photo or video of you rocking the shirts to loyalty@thatdetailshop.com. Include your social media handles for even more benefits.

4 shirts = Rewards

settings.title: Unlock Rewards
settings.description:
Receive a 15% off coupon good for all purchases for the rest of the year. Possibly get featured on our website, highlighted on social media, and considered for a blog write-up about your business, story, or cause.

15% off all year

settings.title: Exclusivityat Its Best
settings.description:
• Limited-Time Designs: Each shirt is available at its launch price for one month only, making it a true collectible for those who act fast.
  • Premium Pricing After Launch: Missed a month? You can still purchase the design, but at a $10 premium—underscoring the value of jumping in early.

settings.title: LoyaltyRewards That Matter
settings.description:
• Save 15% for the rest of the year when you complete 4 purchases.
  • Gain visibility with shoutouts, website features, and potential blog write-ups that highlight your story or business.

settings.title: Premium Quality Materials
settings.description: Our shirts aren't just any ordinary apparel. We use only the finest materials - premium cotton blends, high-quality inks, and expert craftsmanship to ensure maximum comfort and durability. Each piece is carefully selected to maintain its shape, color, and comfort wash after wash.

settings.title: Celebrate Detailing Culture
settings.description: These designs capture the heart of what it means to be a detailer, car enthusiast, or part of the ThatDetailShop community. From relatable humor ("It's Not That Dirty") to bold statements, each shirt tells a story.

settings.title: Community Connection
settings.description: By joining the program you're supporting a veteran-owned business dedicated to building a tight-knit community of like-minded individuals. Each shirt you wear helps spread the word and build our culture.

settings.title: Mainstays& Veteran-Themed Apparel
settings.description:
Our signature collection features premium ThatDetailShop branded essentials—ultra-soft hoodies, structured snapback hats, cozy beanies, and more. Plus, honor service and sacrifice with our veteran-themed apparel that represents strength and resilience.

  • All items made with premium materials for ultimate comfort and durability.

settings.title: CustomBranding (Coming Soon)
settings.description:
Soon you'll be able to add your own business logo or custom designs to our premium apparel. Perfect for detailing businesses, car clubs, and events. Stay tuned for our custom branding portal launch!

  • Message us to be first in line when customization launches.

Each collection is crafted with premium materials and offers its own unique way to represent the ThatDetailShop community.

  • Shop Apparel Collection

settings.heading: Other Collections to Explore
settings.description: In addition to the T-Shirt of the Month Program, we offer these year-round options:
Each collection is crafted with premium materials and offers its own unique way to represent the ThatDetailShop community.

settings.title: StayTuned Each Month
settings.description: A new T-Shirt of the Month Club designwill populate at the start of each month. Don't miss out on the discountedpricing while it lasts!

settings.title: ExploreOur Collections
settings.description: Browse our veteran-themed and ThatDetailShop staples to find year-round designs that speak to you.

settings.title: Share Your Style
settings.description: When you collect 4 shirts, let us know! Submit your proof, social media, and photos to loyalty@thatdetailshop.com to unlock rewards and recognition.

settings.text:
• Monthly designs are discounted for their featured month only.
  • Rewards for 4-shirt purchases reset annually in January.
  • Submissions must include proof of purchase and photos/videos.
  • Currently a non-subscription program (subscription options coming soon).
